author: vors
body:
Current name for the repo became out-dated, after https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-Linux/pull/480 merge.

I suggest rename **PowerShell-Linux ->  PowerShell**

cc @andschwa @SteveL-MSFT @daxian-dbw @FawcettJohnW @joeyaiello @BrucePay

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I support this change. We now build PowerShell, in all its forms.

title: PowerShell-Linux repo name is obsolete
